column3: This currently matches the upstream behavior, though it's clearly not right.\nutACK 7e5fd7198e3b1fae65e1feec7dae7c0083e28203\n

> This currently matches the upstream behavior, though it's clearly not right.

That's our own fault, env_win.cc doesn't exist in the real upstream. It's a simplified windows platform created by me to work around windows-shutdown-during-sync issues in upstream. See https://github.com/bitcoin-core/leveldb/pull/9 and https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6917 .
